name: 25-Piece Electric Screwdriver Set - Cordless Drill with LED Work Light, Automatic Spindle Lock, and Screw Driver Bits by Stalwart (Red)
short_description: CORDLESS DRILL SET - This power screwdriver set comes with 24 different screw driver and drill bits and a charging cord to make sure your mini drill is always charged and ready to go.

FORWARD AND REVERSE SWITCH - Equipped with a forward and reverse switch, this cordless screwdriver is great for drilling screws into walls and taking them out and the comfortable soft grip handle makes using and controlling the power screwdriver a breeze.

AUTOMATIC SPINDLE LOCK - With a no-load speed of 180rpm, this cordless drill features an automatic spindle lock that safely locks the drill bit in place so you can securely complete repairs and DIY projects.

BUILT-IN LED LIGHT - This mini electric screwdriver set features a LED light on the head to illuminate your work zone, making it easier for you to complete tasks in low-light environments like basements, garages, or corners.
PRODUCT DETAILS - Materials: Plastic and Metal. Dimensions: (L) 4.75" x (W) 1.5" x (H) 5.25". Voltage: 4.8 Volts. 25-Piece Screwdriver and Drill Bits Set. Color: Red.
product_description: With a myriad of drill and driver bits, the 25-Piece Cordless Screwdriver Set by Stalwart is perfect for almost any job around the house. This mini drill set comes with 24 different screwdriver and drill bits and a charging cord, so you can be sure your cordless drill is always charged and ready to go. The rechargeable screwdriver is equipped with a forward and reverse switch, great for drilling screws into walls and taking them out, and with the comfortable soft grip handle, using the mini electric screwdriver is a breeze. This hand drill features an automatic spindle lock that safely locks the drill bit in place, has a no-load speed of 180rpm, and comes with a LED work light on the head to make it easier to see what you're working on. IMPORTANT: Stalwart is committed to providing the consumer with the absolute best price and value on our entire line of products. NOTE: This is an exclusive product of Stalwart and ONLY Power Tools Combo Kit by Stalwart are GUARANTEED to be genuine. Avoid buying counterfeit products and transacting with unauthorized sellers.

name: HOTO Electric Screwdriver Kit, 25-Piece Upgraded Bit Set, 3.6V Cordless Screwdriver Rechargeable, Magnetic Case Lid, 3 Torque Settings, 1500mAh Battery, LED Light for Furniture/Electrical Repairs
short_description: ULTRA-CONVENIENT - 25 solid S2 steel drill bits with 60HRC strength for long-lasting durability (1x Magnetic Long Bit | 24x Regular Bits). Swap bits in a blink with the magnetic tip and tackle tight spots with the extension rod. And the auto-on, no-shadow circular LED. It's a mini light show in your palm, turning you into a maestro even in the dark. Whether you're assembling furniture, diving into DIY adventures, or tackling electrical repairs, this electric screwdriver set's got your back

MINIMALIST CHIC - Our magnetic rectangular case clicks closed like a charm, neatly storing all-kit in a clutter-free zone. Slide open the lid with a satisfying fingertip "click" — it's like escaping into a stress-free oasis. And this electric drill, It's lightweight at 0.55 pounds and has a double-layered soft grip made of durable plastic and TPE rubber, giving you unparalleled comfort with every rotation

And that built-in smart sensor? It's your guardian angel. Release the button, the rotation stops—no scratched screws, no injured fingers. Just one hand and you're in complete control

And when it's time to recharge. Just plug it into a Type-C port, and you're done in under 150 minutes. Super easy, super fast, and efficient

IMPORTANT NOTICE: To ensure optimal performance, please fully charge the device before first use. Do not operate the device while it is charging. Prolonged periods without charging may lead to battery malfunction. It is recommended not to leave the device unused for more than 10 months

name: Cordless Electric Screwdriver Set, 8V 10Nm Rechargeable Screwdriver Kit with 89pcs Accessories, 10+1 Torque Settings, 2 Position Handle, Battery Indicator, Flexible Shaft, LED Light
short_description: High-Performance 8V Motor & 10Nm Max Torque - DuroFort cordless screwdriver is powered by a robust 8V motor, generating up to 5.5Nm of electric torque and 10Nm of manual torque with a no-load speed of 320 RPM; This powerful combination ensures efficient handling of diverse fastening jobs with ease and precision

2-Position Handle & 1/4" Magnetic Hex Chuck - DuroFort electric screwdriver is designed with a flexible dual-position handle, offering both pistol-grip and in-line configurations for optimal comfort and control; The built-in 1/4" magnetic hex chuck allows for quick, hassle-free bit changes, enhancing overall efficiency

LED Light & Flexible Extension Shaft - DuroFort electric screwdriver features an automatic LED light that activates with tool use, improving visibility in dark or confined areas; It also includes a flexible extension shaft that bends to multiple angles, allowing easy access to tight spots and hard-to-reach corners, making it perfect for detailed work

High-Capacity Rechargeable Battery - DuroFort cordless screwdriver is equipped with 2000mAh lithium-ion battery, delivering prolonged usage; It fully charges in just 1 hour, ensuring minimal downtime; A convenient battery status indicator lets you easily track the remaining charge, helping you manage your tasks without worrying about unexpected power interruptions

10+1 Torque Setting & Forward/Reserve Control - DuroFort screwdriver provides 10+1 adjustable torque settings, delivering precision and preventing screw stripping or over-tightening; The forward/reverse switch adds convenience, enabling swift changes between tightening and loosening screws for enhanced efficiency

89 Pieces Accessories & Wide Applications - DuroFort screwdriver kit includes everything you need for various household tasks; It contains: 1 cordless screwdriver, 1 carrying case, 1 charger, 8 socket wrenches, 1 extension rod, 1 flexible shaft, 1 adapter, 78 screwdriver bits, and 1 user manual; This cordless screwdriver is ideal for everyday tasks, home improvement, and DIY projects
